author: Andrei Popoviciu
title: Romania on edge as Russia invades Ukraine
description: Despite assurances from Romania’s leadership, many in the Eastern European nation fear wider Russian attacks.
content: Cluj-Napoca, Romania I assure you, no Romanian should fear for the safety of himself and his family, Romanian President Klaus Iohannis said on Thursday, shortly after Russian troops launched a full-s… [+6535 chars]
